name: Decadence
description: Their special is the CBP and it's really pretty special. A rich but not heavy mousse, an intense and lasting chocolate hit, a fair lug of alcohol and biscuit perfection- not too mushy not too crunchy.
tip:
They do more than just CBP.  There are superior brownies, cakes and all sorts of other tastiness on the Decadence menu.
Pick up from the Nawala address, delivery is possible for larger orders,
review:
Their special is the CBP and it's really pretty special. A rich but not heavy mousse, an intense and lasting chocolate hit, a fair lug of alcohol and biscuit perfection- not too mushy not too crunchy.

ඩෙකඩන්ස් කියන්නේ ලංකාවේ ගෘහස්ථව නිපදවනු ලබන (දියවැඩියාව පතුරවන) විෂ්, මන්ච්කින් වැනි රසකැවිලි පිරිනමන ආයතනයක්. ඔවුන්ගේ චොකලට් බිස්කට් පුඩිම සුවිශේෂබව අපි සොයාගත්තා.
